uk.ac.aber.dcs.sta17.cs12420.as.model

Class GameModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • uk.ac.aber.dcs.sta17.cs12420.as.model.GameModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameModelInterface

    public class GameModel
extends java.util.Observable
implements GameModelInterface
    This is the basic GameModel interface which is to serve as the game basic core.
    Version:
    19.03.2014
    Author:
    Sta17/Steven

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      GameModel(WordListInterface wordlist)
      the constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getHidden()
      this method returns the words to guess
      java.lang.String getLetters()
      this method returns the letters that have already been guessed
      java.lang.String getLettersDisplay()
      this method returns the letters that have already been guessed for Display, which is all letters minus correct ones for easiness.
      java.lang.String getVisible()
      this method returns what the user is allowed to see
      int guessLeft()
      this method tells how many guesses are left
      java.lang.String instructions()
      This just prints the basic hangman instructions and returns it as a string, the method used return, so the text can be transfered to medium desired.
      void newGame()
      resets all the game settings so that a new game is ready with a new word.
      int preSetGuessLeft()
      This method returns the value of before the guessesleft where set using the SetguessLeft() method
      boolean tryThis(char letter)
      this method sees if the letter is in the words if it is it updates what the user can see (visible) if not it removes a guess
      boolean tryWord(java.lang.String guess)
      this method sees if the word guess is correct if it is it updates what the user can see (visible) if not it removes 5 guesses
